name: The Puppet Whisperer
description:
A short story about a puppeteer and their puppet.

Team

  • Kristi Jimenez (HusbandoGoddess): Project Lead, Writer, Programmer
  • Katy_133: Artist
  • Wannabe Cat: GUI Programmer and Programmer
  • Paul Robins: Composer
  • Spooky Raven GUI by: Jamie Scribbles Games

This game features two fonts: Zen Loop and Open Dyslexic. You can change the size of both fonts as well!

Created for O2A2 Jam.

Word Count: 924
